      • loadWidgetsOnScreen

        public void loadWidgetsOnScreen()
        Loads the widgets from the array onto the screen. This is used when the array is read from the serialized file

      • moveWidget

        public void moveWidget(java.lang.String type,
                       int locX,
                       int locY)
        Called when a widget is moved, it looks to see if the location being moved to is full or not. If it is, the panels swap positions, otheriwse, the panel is placed there, and the array is updated
        Parameters:
        type - String of the widget being moved so it can be searched for
        locX - int value of the X location that the panel was dropped
        locY - int value of the Y location where the panel was dropped

      • clearScreen

        public void clearScreen()
        Method to clear the screen of all widgets. Used when the user Adds/ Removes Widgets.

        public java.awt.Point search(java.lang.String s)
        Searches the screen for the location of the Widget type passed in
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the point at which the widget is, null if not found

        Returns:
